transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha bolo. Bolo.
Customer: Sir India Mart se baat ho rahi hai. Matlab India Mart se baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Ha bolo.
Executive: Bhai Hari call me baat ho rahi hai sir. Shubham baat kar raha tha. Aapne abhi call Kavita se baat hui usko not satisfied diya tha sir. Iska reason hi janna tha aapne call ko not satisfied diya kya dikkat hai sir?
Customer: Mere ko lead hi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Lead. Achha lead nahi aa rahi aapko. Wohi Pune se nahi aa rahi ya phir all over India matlab Pune se nahi aa rahi na aapko?
Customer: All over India bhi jo aa rahi hai na woh ek do machine ki aa rahi hai ek do machine. Ek do machine se dhandha hota hai kya?
Executive: Ek second mai dekh leta hu sir ek do machine. Machine ka product hai aapka sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Toh machine toh sir machine ki toh ek do hi aayegi na machine ki agar aayegi agar machine koi machine ki requirement aayegi.
Customer: Machine ka pura aur phir lag ja baat karo. Sab dekh hi rakha hai maine Deccan ka jo 2 lakh ka 1.5 lakh ka kya aa raha hai aapke piche se. Dobara wapas call karta hu mai aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product
